translation: Yim chhi zh ḥrf, ḥrvf mqṭʿātv andrh, yimn hund mʿny zanhi panh prvrdgar.
Qsm chhu yymhi mqds ktabhi hund,

Yosh byan krvunụ̄ chhe aḥkamn ḥlal v ḥrams th ḥq v bạṭls, byyhi kr aashi so ktab yʿny qrān mjyd nạzl lvḥ mḥfvẓs petth āsmani dnyahs kun babrkt shbs andr, kyazi asụ̄ chhi lvukn tihindi shfqt mokhh aath qrān mjyds andr tim chyz byan krvunụ̄ yim timn mẓr chhi, pnnhi ʿdhab sintụ̄ khocznavh vunụ̄.
Ath shbs andr chhu prth ḥkmt vvl mʿāmlh sanhi pyshy tlh ḥkm ṣadr spdith ṭe yivan krnh.
Yy chhu spdan sany ḥkmh sintụ̄, asụ̄ chhi bvjh rḥmt yosh tuhndis prvrdgar sndi ṭrfh chhe, tohyhi pyghmbr svzh vun,
Yuth tuhundi vasṭh lvukn pvur aṭlaʿ spdi, be shk chhu suh sytthah bvzn vvl th sytthah zann vvl.
Yus malk chhu āsmann th zmynn hund, byyhi tmhi sarikue yhi timn mnzbag chhu, agr tvhụ̄ yqyn krvunụ̄ chhiv.
Kanhh mʿbvdah chhunh ts vrạe, sue chhu bdns mnz zuvah vatnavvun. Byyhi chhu sue tuhund prvrdgar tuhndyn malyn buddi bbn hund malk th prvrdgar.
Blkh chhi tim tvḥyd vghạrh pazv kthv nishhi shks mnz. Dnyakis gindns drokns sintụ̄ mṣrvf, ạkhrtch chhkh nh kanhh fkre. Vonụ̄ yylhi yim lvukh pvz vaẓḥ th ṣaf spdith th mann nh kynhh.
Ps pyạriv tvhụ̄ tihindi khạṭr tth dohs yymhi doh āsman kh ṭrfh aakh dhah bvznh yiyhi yus sarine dryintthụ̄ āshi yivan.

Suh yiyhi vlnh lvukn, tim dapn yhi chhu ʿdhabah dg tulh vun. Aamhi andrh chhu murad suh qḥṭ yth mnz ahli mkh mbtla spdụ̄. Yymuyk sbb avs bddʿā ḥẓrt rsvl krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm sund yylhi timv skht tklyf hyvt duyn nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slms byyhi mslmann. Ẓạhry sbb spud aamhi qḥṭuk kh ḥẓrt thmamh yim shhri ymamkụ̄ bddụ̄ ryys ạsụ̄ spde mslman. Mkh kyv kạfrv hiycz skht mlamt krnụ̄ timn tth petth. Timv kvr shhr ymamh petthh mks kun ghlh svzun bnd, mks kun avs ymamh petthe ghlh yivan, ypạrụ̄ kinụ̄ spz bạrsh th bnd, mkkụ̄ lvukh hytin bochhhi sintụ̄ mrnụ̄, qạʿdh chhu skht bochhhi hindis ḥals andr khshk sạly hndis vqts andr chhu bvznh yivan āsman kh ṭrfh dh vothan. Ghrẓ mkkụ̄ lvukh yylhi skht tng yin qḥṭh sbbh tim lgn ʿạjzy krnhi, tim hyn dʿā krun.

Ae sanhi prvrdgar, dvur krth aashi nishhi yhi qḥṭuk ʿdhab. Be shk asụ̄ aanav vonụ̄ ẓrvr ayman. Chnanchh yhi pyshn gvyy spz yithh pạtthụ̄ pvur kh abv sfyan byyhi bʿẓv qryshv lykhụ̄ nby kryms ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm kh tvhụ̄ kritv dʿāe khyr, byyhi kritv thmamh ymans fhmạysh suh svziha byyhi ghlh. Byyhi kvr abv sfyann vʿdh pnnhi mslman spdnuk. Chnanchh aamhi brvntth kun chhu Allah tʿālyā frmavan suh vʿdh avs nh bṣdqi dl.
Yim lvukh kithh pạtthụ̄ rtthn nṣyḥt aamhi ʿdhab sintụ̄ yymhi sintụ̄ tuhndi aymanuk tvqʿ yiyhi ha thavnh ḥalankh timn nishhi vaczvv pyghmbrah tadi shanuk vyczhnavh vun.
Tvpth krtimv ts pyghmbrs nishhi srtạby th yylgụ̄ vannhi kh yhi chhu mvtah kmụ̄ tanụ̄ yimh kthh hychhnvvmut.

Asụ̄ krv ḥjt pvur krnh khạṭr kynhh kalah timn nishhi yhi ʿdhab dvur mgr tvhụ̄ kriv byyhi ty yhi kran ạsiv, kfrth nafrmany. Chnanchh yhi pyshn gvyy spz yithh pạtthụ̄ pvur kh nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn kvr dʿā, tvpth pyvv rvud. Byyhi lyvkhukh thmamh ymanyas tmụ̄ svuz ghlh. Mkh kyn lvukn spz farghu albaly mysr, pryshạny gykh dvur. Mgr suh kth sna krhn tim pnun vʿdh pvur, byyhi hyvtukh ty krun yhi kran ạsụ̄.
Aadh yymhi doh rttvkh asụ̄ tmhi bvdd skht rtth vunah, tmhi doh chhrrvkh nh. Asụ̄ ge tmhi dvh pvur antqam hynh vạlụ̄.
Albth byyhi kr aashi āzmạysh timn brvntth frʿūn sndis qvms yymhi ṭryqh kh āv timn nishhi pyghmbrah ʿzt vvl yʿny mvsyā ʿlyh alslam.

Tmụ̄ frmvvukh ae qvmi frʿūn kryvukh me ḥvalh khdae sndụ̄ bndh bny asrayyl tohyhi rngarng tklyfn chhvukh krimtụ̄. Pnnhi ghlamy nishhi kriyvukh tim āzad. Bh chhus khdae sndi ṭrfh pyghmbrah amant dar. Bh chhus nh kanhh kthah pnnhi ṭrfh vnan, me yus ḥkm khdae sndi ṭrfh vatan chhu bh chhus suh ḥkm tohyhi nishhi vatnavan. Lhādha pazi tohyhi tʿmyl aḥkam krun.

Byyhi frmvvukh mah kriv srkshy khdays nishhi. Bh chhus tohyhi nishhi āmut nnụ̄ dlyl hyth pnnhi nbvtch yʿny ʿṣa th yadi byẓa. Yylhi frʿūnn th tihndụ̄ qvmn mvn nh blkh hyvtukh mshvrh krun mvsyā ʿlyh alslam sndi qtluk th marnuk.
Byyhi chhus pnnis khdays yus tuhund khda thi chhu pnah mngan tvhụ̄ kya kriv me shhyd knhi lạe lạe.
Hrgah tvhụ̄ me pczh kriv nh tylhi rvuziv me nish alg. Yhi vnith thi rvudụ̄ tim mvsyā ʿlyh alslams tklyf vatnavan.

Ps mvng dʿā mvsyā ʿlyh alslamn pnnis prvrdgars, ya Allah tim chhi skht shryr lvukh, me dinjat yihindi shrh nishhi. Allah tʿālyā hn frmvvukh ae mvsyā, aashi kvr tuhund dʿā qbvl, vonụ̄ vvt yihindi fạṣluk vqt.

Ps kvr aashi ḥkm mvsyā ʿlyh alslams kh tvhụ̄ niyriv myạnụ̄ bndh bny asrạyyl hyth rạcz mnze. Brvntthh yiyhi vathi andr tohyhi dryav, tvhụ̄ lạe zih tth dryavs tvri sintụ̄ czndd, suh spdi khshk. Suh diyhi tohyhi aapvrtrnh khạṭr vath, tvhụ̄ yylhi bny asrạyyl hyth aapvr triv, dryav rvzi aath ḥals petth. Tvhụ̄ krụ̄zynh kanhh fkr kh khbr chha frʿūn thi ma yiyhi suthi ma vashi aath dryavs andr tvpth ma tri aapvr. Aamich fkr th andyshhi krụ̄ zyv tvhụ̄ kynhh. Kyazi tohyhi pte nyri frʿūn lshkr hyth tohyhi grftar krnh khạṭr, rat rạty nyrnh sintụ̄ hykhi nh suh tohyhi rttithe.
Blkh trạvizyvn tvhụ̄ tvhụ̄ dryav pnnis ḥals petth yuth frʿūn snz lshkr thi dryavs mnz vashi. Be shk so lshkr chhe dryavs mnzvạtith phtth vunụ̄ th ghrq spdvunụ̄. Tvpth yylhi tim phttụ̄ th hlak ge.
Pth kun trạvụ̄ timv kạtyah bagh th nagh rad.
Kvtah zraʿtuk zmyn th kạczah ʿmdh jayhi.
Byyhi ʿīsh v āramuk saman yth mnz khoshḥạly ạs āsan.
Nafrmann sintụ̄ chhi asụ̄yohe mʿāmlh kran. Aamhi sary tihindi mal v dvltuk vạrth bnạvụ̄ aashi byyhi lvukh yʿny bny asrạyyl.
Ps vvd nh timn petth nh āsmann, nh zmynn, byyhi ạsụ̄ nh tim mhlt dinh āmtụ̄ yʿny timn āyhi nh mzdyd mhlt dinh.
Albth duyt aashi yithe pạtthụ̄ njat bny asrạyln skht dhlt kh ʿdhab nishhi.

Yʿny frʿūn sndi ẓlm v stm nishhi. Be shk suh sytthah srksh sytthah ḥdh nishhi ddlh vunyv andrh. Aakh nʿmt kr aashi bny asrạyln petth yhi kh njat duytukh frʿūnh sndi shr nishhi aamhi ʿlavh krkh byakh nʿmt.
Byyhi dicz aashi fvqyt bny asrạyln tamhi zmanh kyn byyan lvukn petth pnnhi ʿlm v ḥkmt mvjvb.
Byyhi ditụ̄ aashi timn pnnhi qdrtkụ̄ time nishanh yimn mnz tuhndi ḥqh nnụ̄ anʿāmat ạsụ̄ mn v slvāy vghạrh.
Be shk yim kafr chhi qyamtkụ̄ vʿīd bvuzith qyamts ankar kran. Tvpth chhi vnan,

Sạnụ̄ akhyry ḥalt chhe yhe kh aashi chhu yth dnyahs andr mrun. Tvpth chhunh aashi byyhi zndh spdun. Yʿny akhyry ḥalt sạnụ̄ ḥyati aukhrvy chhanh blkh chhe akhyry ḥalt mvt dunyvy. Ashi chhunh mgr aaky ltthi mrun tvpth yimiv nh asụ̄ byyhi zndh krnh.
Ae mslmanv hrgah tvhụ̄ mrnh pth byyhi zndh gczhnh kis aʿtqads mnz pziyạrụ̄ chhiv, zyadh antẓar kya chhu krun, tylhi anụ̄ tvkh sạnụ̄ mạlụ̄ buddi bb tim spdụ̄ tn byyhi zndh.

Kya sna tim qrysh chha qvts th shvkts mnz zyadh kinh tubʿ )ymn kis badshah( sundqvm ya yim lvukh timn brvntth ạsụ̄ ʿād thmvd vghạrh. Aashi vuchhnh timn kynhh, aashi krụ̄ tim hlak th brbad, kyazi tim ạsụ̄ skht nafrman. Hrgah yim qrysh mkkụ̄ kafr nafrmạny nishhi baz yin nh, yim kithh knụ̄ bchavan sanhi ʿdhab n, shhi pnun pan.
Byyhi krụ̄ nh aashi pạdh āsman th zmyn byyhi yhi timn mnz chhu yymhi ṭryqh kh asụ̄ kya asụ̄ aakh ʿbth th be hvudh kạmah kran.
Aashi yylhi tgụ̄ yim yithụ̄ bddụ̄ mkhlvq pạdh krnụ̄, aashi nishhi kya ʿjayb chhu ansan mrnh pth byyhi zndh krun. Lykn akthr lvukh chhinh zanan.
Pzipạtthụ̄ fạṣluk doh yʿny qyamtuk doh chhu sarine hndi dvbarh zndh spdnuk, byyhi jza dinuk vqt mqrr krnh āmut.
Yymhi doh nh kanhh tʿlq dar kạnshi tʿlq dars bkar yiyhi, nah hykhi kạnshi hindi ṭrfh kanhh mdde kạnshi vạtith.

Mgr yimn petth Allah tʿālyā hn rḥm kvrmut āshi yʿny bayman timn yiyhi yạry th mdd krnh, byyhi krn tim thi mdd aakh akis shfaʿt sintụ̄. Be shk Allah tʿālyā chhu ghạlb th zbrdst. Suh hyyhi kafrn nishhi antqam. Yas suh vakrih th be zar āshi ts hykhi nh mdd krith kanhh, yhi chhu suh rḥmt vvl, yimn tihnz rḥmt shamli ḥal āshi timn diyhi suh shfaʿtuk mrtbh.
Pzipạtthụ̄ zqvmuk kul chhu,
Nafrmann hund ghdha.
Yymuyk rng āshi plimhi hund. Sue āshi grykan tihnzn yddn mnz,
Yithh pạtthụ̄ ābh rsr chhe dyghi mnz groth kran.
Allah tʿālyā frmavi ʿdhab kyn malkn rttiyvun yhi kafr tvpth niyvun khkhri, trạviyvun mnz bag jhnms.
Tvpth trạviv amis so rasrah klh petthụ̄ yymhi sintụ̄ zyadh ʿdhab vatys.

ʿdhabkụ̄ malk vanns vuchh mzh yymhi ʿdhabuk. Be shk czh avsukh na pnnis qvms mnz bvdd th ziyutth pans zana. Yhi chhue cze tʿẓym v tkrym krnh yivan. Yithh pạtthụ̄ czh pnnis pans mʿẓm v mkrm zạnith sanyn aḥkamn tḥqyr th ʿār avsukh kran jhnmyn yiyhi vannh.
Be shk ʿdhab kya gvv sue yth tvhụ̄ shk ạsiv kran.
Be shk yim khdays khoczvunụ̄ āsn tim āsn amn vāram chh jayhi mnz mḥfvẓ.
Yʿny baghn th nagh radn mnz.
Nạlụ̄ lagn tim zạvil th motthi pattikụ̄ jamh, aakh akis sydi syvd āsn bihith.
Byyhi krv asụ̄ timn nythr jnth chn ḥvurn sintụ̄ yimh prnhi th achh vychhhi krith āsn.
Mngh navan āsn tim jntn mnz aṭmnanh san prth myvh.
Czhn nh tathi mvtuk mzh mgr sue goddnuyk mvt yymuyk mzh timv dnyahs mnz czuhmut āshi yʿny tathi mrn nh tim zanhh thi. Byyhi rchhhi timn Allah tʿālyā jhnm kh ʿdhabh nishhi.
Yhi svrue āshi timn tihindis prvrdgar sund fẓl th mhrbạny, yhe gyhi bdd rstgạry th kamyạby.
Yhi qrān mjyd kvr ashi shl th āsan aamy mokhh tuhndi lght yʿny bzubani ʿrby yuth timn lvukn fkri trith tim nṣyḥt rttn, yylhi nh aamhi sintụ̄ thi yimn kynhh banhi.
Ps pyạriv tvhụ̄ timn kya banhi, tim chhi pyarvunụ̄ kh tihund ḥal kya spdi. Tihndi ḥqh spdi ʿdhab. Tuhndi ḥqh āshi nṣrt v yạry.
